constructor-arg.value: SELECT m.movie_id, m.movie_name_eng, m.movie_name_rus, m.movie_year, group_concat(g.genre_name,', ') genres FROM movies m JOIN movie_genres mg ON m.movie_id = mg.movie_id JOIN genres g ON mg.genre_id = g.genre_id GROUP BY m.movie_id,m.movie_name_eng,m.movie_name_rus,m.movie_countries,m.movie_year,m.movie_price
